abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32579590, pmid32592501, pmid32565626, pmid32591908, pmid32589990, pmid32592522, pmid32573838, pmid32584530, pmid32589687, pmid32590808, pmid32592113, pmid32589799, pmid32592671, pmid32584526, pmid32565620, pmid32590775, pmid32592396, pmid32589801, pmid32592539, pmid32584797, pmid32592420, pmid32592502, pmid32589794
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.01
